content:
Here is the updated report based on the execution logs:

# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining System (around x=41, y=-82)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (41.0, -82.0) mining coal
- Input chest (iron chest) at (41.5, -83.5) storing coal
- Output chest (wooden chest) at (41.5, -80.5) storing coal
- Additional storage chest (iron chest) at (41.5, -84.5) storing coal

### Iron Smelting System (around x=46, y=-80)
Consists of:
- Input chest (wooden chest) at (46.5, -79.5) storing iron ore
- Two stone furnaces:
  - First furnace at (45.0, -81.0)
  - Second furnace at (47.0, -81.0)
- Two burner inserters:
  - First inserter at (45.5, -79.5) moving items from chest to first furnace
  - Second inserter at (47.5, -79.5) moving items from chest to second furnace
- Output chest (wooden chest) at (49.5, -80.5) storing iron plates

# ERROR TIPS

### Chest Management Issues
- Monitor chest capacity - several chests are showing "chest is full" warnings
- Empty output chests regularly to prevent production blockages

### Fuel Management
- Keep mining drills fueled - one drill shows "out of fuel" warning
- Ensure consistent fuel supply to all burner-powered entities

### Production Flow Issues
- Inserters showing "furnace belt at drop position is blocked" warnings - ensure proper item flow
- Monitor furnace input/output to prevent bottlenecks
- Ensure proper alignment between inserters and their target entities

### Resource Management
- Verify resource availability before attempting insertion operations
- Maintain adequate iron ore supply to keep smelting system running efficiently

# NAMESPACE

### Variables
- `chest`: Entity (wooden-chest)
- `iron_ore`: Item quantity
- `source_chest`: Entity (wooden-chest)

### Functions
- `insert_item(prototype, target, quantity)`: Attempts to insert items into target entity
  - Success: When items exist in inventory and target has space
  - Failure: When items don't exist in inventory
- `extract_item(prototype, source, quantity)`: Attempts to extract items from source entity
  - Success: When items exist in source
  - Failure: When items not found in source or source entity invalid
